message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering what you'll gain.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $20,000. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product, considering its value and my budget. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my willingness to buy.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product, considering its value and my financial constraints. I believe this is a reasonable price considering the market value and my willingness to buy.
